sentences.english: Conclusion The prognosis of PHT secondary to rheumatic diseases is pessimistic.
sentences.chinese: 结论风湿性疾病继发肺动脉高压预后不良。

sentences.english: Conclusion The clildren with rheumatic carditis had atypical system and sign.

sentences.english: Electrical treatment will be good for your rheumatism.
sentences.chinese: 电疗可以治你的风湿病。

sentences.english: It is used to treat rheumatism and enuresis of children as a folk medicine in China.
sentences.chinese: 民间多用于治疗风湿性关节炎和小儿遗尿症。

sentences.english: Saag also was the lead author of the 2008 RA-drug guidelines.
sentences.chinese: Saag博士也是2008年风湿病药物指南的主编。

sentences.english: Rheumatoid arthritis is a painful condition that affects your joints.
sentences.chinese: 风湿性关节炎是影响关节令人痛苦的疾病。

sentences.english: Rheumatic pain foretells the coming of a storm.
sentences.chinese: 风湿痛预示着暴风雨的来临。

sentences.english: No sooner had the patient taken the drug than she vomited.
sentences.chinese: 风湿痛刚一减轻，医生就嘱咐病人停止服药。

sentences.english: With anti-rheumatic drugs or antibiotics are ineffective treatment class medicine.
sentences.chinese: 用抗风湿药或抗生素类药治疗无效。

sentences.english: Have you ever had rheumatic++ fever? If you have, please give me the details.
sentences.chinese: 你患过风湿病吗？要是有的话，请把详细情况告诉我。

sentences.english: Corticosteroids and their synthetic analogs are used to treat rheumatism and other inflammatory ailments.
sentences.chinese: 皮质类固醇及其合成物可用来治疗风湿病和其它炎症。

sentences.english: Conclusion LAIP is of important significance in the diagnosis of rheumatic carditis.
sentences.chinese: 结论LAIP在判断风湿活动方面有较大价值。

sentences.english: But the possibility she had arsenic for rheumatism, say, is quite likely, " she said.
sentences.chinese: 但不排除她因为风湿病服用砷的可能性。
